forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with some sunshine during the afternoon hours. High 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 33F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High near 10C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds SE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 46F. Winds SE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. High 56F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming less numerous late. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High near 55F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 7C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. High 52F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 39F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 52F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
